content: EL WS Eye lag screws Eye lag screw for suspended ceiling applications ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Screws- - - ### FEATURES:Features Vertical or horizontal mounting of ceiling hangers Various lengths available for versatile applications Applications Fastening threaded rod anchoring systems to wood or metal For suspended ceiling applications ### TECHNICAL DATA: Screw head type: Eye lag with hole Screw drive/recess type: Eye lag Collated: No Technical Data | Screw head type | Eye lag with hole | Screw drive/recess type | Eye lag | Collated | No | Screw diameter d | 0.25 in | Product Class | Standard | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor ### ITEMS- 388245 - Eyelag screw zinc 1/4 x 2 EL SD - Package Size 100 pc - 288574 - Eyelag screw zinc 1/4 x 2-3/4 EL S - Package Size 100 pc - 388249 - Eyelag screw zinc 1/4 x 3 EL WS - Package Size 100 pc - 388247 - Eyelag screw zinc 1/4 x 3 EL SD - Package Size 100 pc - 388251 - Eyelag screw zinc 1/4 x 4 EL WS - Package Size 100 pc
